values:
Lately I have noticed a disturbing trend developing, so I thought that I should make myself clear.

There will be no hugging me, or thinking about doing so. Whining will not help, nor 'puppy eyes' attempts to get at my spark. You try, I will shoot you or throw you to the nearest more bad-tempered decepticon.

Please try to keep in mind that I am a decepticon. Though I won't kill you on sight, I want no fleshling displays of affection. Go find the nearest autobot instead, like Ironhide.


Unless I'm drunk.


Sunburn.
Last days hasn't been good. I need to tear someone into bits, starting with a certain pair of slagging autobots and that damneable human.

*Shuffles papers*

I'd just like for all of you to know...

Since Coldfront is currently out cold in the game, and was regretably eaten by the kraken in the chatbox. I will be taking over the updating of this place until further notice. 

Do you have any idea of how much fun it is to comb the beaches for all the neccessary pieces? And I hate puzzles...

Later, I would also like to have a talk with you about that magic marker thing...

Doing that to a poor, passed-out mech. And I have got a hangover too.



~Sunburn~
